attributes.action: Make it mandatory for the DWP to request a medical report from a patient's doctor before being allowed to reject a benefit claim
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I, and many others, have been informed by rights organisations that the only way we might succesfully claim benefits is to get consultants' medical reports at our OWN EXPENSE to submit for DLA and IB claims. This discriminates against those on low incomes who cannot afford the c.£100 fee for EACH such report. The DWP should NOT be permitted to deny any claim without obtaining a medical report
